downloadDescription: Wondering how cloud computer can benefit your construction business? Read this guide to learn from industry experts why your industry is choosing the cloud.
detailsSection: The construction industry is a very traditional sector, albeit one that is embracing new technology faster now than at any time in its past. Like many industries, the construction industry is now consuming IT services and solutions at an accelerating rate, needing to acquire more and more computing power, with bigger and faster servers to run the latest business critical applications. Although costs of servers may have reduced in recent years, the need to keep servers and software updated incurs significant capital costs and construction firms are finding they have to recruit and retain highly skilled IT staff to keep their existing infrastructure and applications working.
